root.name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Lethal Foes
root.description: GameplayMany people consider the controls for web-swinging are on the two back buttons of the controller, unlike other superhero SNES games of the time. Players can swing right or left.LanguageThe option mode is in English, which is strange for a Japanese Super Famicom game. The rest of the text is in Japanese except for the saying,"He is... Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man."MusicThe music is the sound track from the hit T.V. show Spider-Man and His Amazing Friends.
